text: SuperFight is a professional wrestling supercard event produced by Major League Wrestling (MLW). The first event was broadcast as a special live episode of Fusion on beIN Sports on February 2, 2019. The second event event was MLW's first-ever pay-per-view card, titled Saturday Night SuperFight, and was held later that year on November 2, 2019. ==Dates and venues== {| class="wikitable sortable" !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|# !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|Event !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|Date !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|City !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|Venue !style="background: #e3e3e3;"|Main event |- |1||SuperFight||February 2, 2019||Philadelphia, Pennsylvania||2300 Arena||Low Ki (c) vs. Tom Lawlor for the MLW World Heavyweight Championship |- |2||Saturday Night SuperFight||November 2, 2019||Cicero, Illinois||Cicero Stadium||Jacob Fatu (c) vs. LA Park for the MLW World Heavyweight Championship |} ==References== ==External links== *Major League Wrestling official website Category:Major League Wrestling shows Category:Recurring events established in 2019
title: MLW SuperFight
